info.name: Background Image to Google
info.description: I needed to make one of those. Adds a background image to Google's search page, this doesn't apply to Chrome's new tab page.
info.additionalInfo:
Features this far: 
* Changes the background image
* Makes the Google Doodle (or Google icon) look like a card to not contrast too hard with the background
* Hides the alternative language picker because it's irrelevant

Change log:

1.0
+ changes the background image
+ makes the Google doodle look like a card
+ hides the alternative language picker

---

settings.label: Make the doodle look like a card?

options.label: yes
no
options.value: /* google doodle was not made to look like a card, via the user setting */

options.label: no (show)
options.value: /* showing alternative language selector, via the user setting */
